name: 珊莉·卡斯韦尔 Shanley Caswell
intro: Date of Birth 3 December 1991, Sarasota, Florida, USA Height 5' 4" (1.63 m) Mini Bio (1) Shanley Caswell was born on December 3, 1991 in Sarasota, Florida, USA. She is an actress, known for The Conjuring (2013), Detention (2011) and NCIS: New Orleans (2014). Trivia (1) Between auditions, she earned her GED, taking high school classes over the Internet in Los Angeles, graduating a year earlier than if she attended regular high school in order to work full-time.
